name: case-vivo
description: Case para o Processo Seletivo Vivo

scripts.prestart: npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate $
scripts.test:coverage: nyc --all --include models --include services --include controllers mocha tests/unit/*.js --exit
scripts.restore: npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all

author: Lucas-Accurcio
